member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.GraphicsExtension.DrawRoundedRectangle(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Draws a rounded rectangle specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height and the radius for the arcs that make the rounded edges.
member.param: A that determines the color, width and style of the rectangle.
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.
Width of the rectangle to draw.
Height of the rectangle to draw.
The radius of the arc used for the rounded edges.
